alert.note: Alert for Dickson; Houston; Montgomery; Robertson; Stewart (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 9:13PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dickson, Montgomery, southeastern Stewart, northeastern Houston and northwestern Robertson Counties through 1000 PM CST... At 913 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Erin, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarksville, Erin, Guthrie, Tennessee Ridge, Adams, Cedar Hill, Cumberland City, Slayden, Indian Mound, Palmyra, Cunningham and Woodlawn. This includes Interstate 24 between mile markers 1 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
